item.title: The number of mis-issued 1.1.1.1 certificates grows. Here’s the latest.
item.description: Everything to know about about the mishap that threatened to expose millions of users’ queries.

item.title: Mis-issued certificates for 1.1.1.1 DNS service pose a threat to the Internet
item.description: The three certificates were issued in May but only came to light Wednesday.
